messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'd just like to do a little whining...
messages.msgSnippet: Well, Pam, I just saw that I sent a post replying to something from LAST MONTH (and it was a little snarky, too--not when I wrote it, of course, but it sure
messages.messageBody:
Well, Pam, I just saw that I sent a post replying to something from LAST
MONTH (and it was a little snarky, too--not when I wrote it, of course,
but it sure looked that way when it posted), so jump right in!

:-) Diane

>... and say that I've had a very busy week and I've been saving all these
>digests and I'm COMPLETELY BUMMED (hope that's not a bad word in the UK,
>Shyrley! <g>) that I'm only up to MONDAY's postings and everything I want to
>say has no doubt already been said OR the discussion has long since moved
>on.
>
>There, I feel much better for sniveling. I will return you all to your
>CURRENT posts. <g> When I catch up, maybe I'll be able to play, too!
>
>Pam
>

messages.subject: I'd just like to do a little whining...
messages.msgSnippet: ... and say that I ve had a very busy week and I ve been saving all these digests and I m COMPLETELY BUMMED (hope that s not a bad word in the UK, Shyrley!
messages.messageBody:
... and say that I've had a very busy week and I've been saving all these
digests and I'm COMPLETELY BUMMED (hope that's not a bad word in the UK,
Shyrley! <g>) that I'm only up to MONDAY's postings and everything I want to
say has no doubt already been said OR the discussion has long since moved
on.

There, I feel much better for sniveling. I will return you all to your
CURRENT posts. <g> When I catch up, maybe I'll be able to play, too!

Pam
